<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/japan-china.jpg" alt="Japan China Korea Tour Package" title="Japan China Korea Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>The Fareast Asian part of the world is one of the most magnificent and unique destinations for every traveller. It is one of the most amazing places if you are looking forward to having a wholesome vacation experience. From Mount Fuji to the Great Wall of China, this Japan, China and Korea tour package will ensure that you have an experience of a lifetime. Go on this amazing and mesmerising tour which will help you to have a one of a kind holiday with your family.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Japan China Korea Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Tokyo</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>Upon reaching Tokyo after covering a flight journey you will be greeted and received by our tour representative who will get you checked in to your allotted hotel here where you will be spending the night. The remainder of your day will be free for you to indulge in some leisurely activities.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Sightseeing in Tokyo</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be taken on a sightseeing tour of the modern and interesting city of Tokyo. Accompanied with a knowledgeable guide you will be seeing places like – Asakusa Temple Complex, Nakamise shopping arcade, Imperial Palace, sky tree etc. you will also be taken up the Tokyo tower observatory’s deck where you can savour some of the most breath-taking views of the city below. Before heading back to your hotel for a night stay you will be made to visit the Shinjuku garden.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Tokyo – Hiroshima</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Early in the morning, you will be made to head for a sightseeing tour of the famous volcanic peak of Mount Fuji, after having your breakfast. You can stroll around the lakes of Hakone or Ashi. Later on, after a full sightseeing tour here you will be made to board the Bullet train headed for Hiroshima where on reaching you will be made to check in to your allotted hotel here.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Hiroshima – Osaka</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to visit the famous bomb dome here along with a visit to Sadako monument and the stunning cenotaph structures. In order to take a closer look at the history of Hiroshima, you will be made to head on for the history museum here along with a visit to the peace park. Finally, after a day of sightseeing here you will be made to proceed for Osaka, which is situated at a distance of almost 4 hours. On reaching there you will be checked in to your hotel here for staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Osaka – Nara – Kyoto – Osaka</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to head for your next tourist destinations of Nara and Kyoto here which are known for its own quirkiness and unique features. In Nara, you can observe numerous deer roaming around freely along with visiting the famous UNESCO world heritage centre of Todaiji Temple. Nara is located at a distance of merely 40 minutes of road journey from Osaka while Kyoto is located at a distance of around 1 hour from here. Once in Kyoto, you will be made to visit the famous temples of Kiyomizu and Nijo Castle. Finally, after a full day of exploring the nearby interesting tourist attractions here, you will be made to head back to Osaka where you will be spending the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Osaka – Seoul</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to head on for your next destination of Seoul in South Korea via a flight journey. On reaching our tour representative will transfer you to your allotted hotel here after visiting the famous Seoul tower.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 & 8 :</span>Sightseeing of Seoul</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>There are innumerable places for the tourists to visit in Seoul. You will be made to visit several of the palaces here along with enjoying the cherry blossoms in the park here. For a closer look at their culture, you will be made to visit the heritage centres and museums here. This is also a wonderful shopping destination here where people come to visit and indulge in mind-boggling shopping expeditions. Not just this you will also be taken to the weapons free buffer zone between the north and South Korea along with exploring its wildlife here by going on safaris here.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 9 :</span>Seoul – Beijing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be assisted to the airport here where you will be boarding on the flight headed for Beijing. On arrival, you will immediately be taken on a guided tour of the city which will include visiting places like – the Forbidden City, imperial garden, Tiananmen Square etc. after this you will be checked in to your allotted hotel here where you will be staying for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 10 :</span>Sightseeing in Beijing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Beijing is home to some of the quirkiest and the most unique tourist attractions here which you will be made to visit after the completion of your breakfast in the morning. You will be exploring the wonderful destinations like the Great Wall of China, the 2008 Olympic stadium etc. this will be one experience that you will cherish for a lifetime. After a whole day of fun and adventure, you will be made to head back to your hotel here where you will be staying for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 11 :</span>Beijing – Xian</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to proceed on for Xian via a bullet train ride of almost 6 hours. You will be reaching Xian – the city of historical sites and heritage centres where on arrival our tour representative will greet you. After this, you will be checked in to your hotel here where you will be spending the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 12 :</span>Sightseeing of Xian</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After completing your breakfast in the morning you will be made to visit the famous terracotta warrior museum along with the factory. The entire place is filled with life-sized statues of warriors and horses arranged in the formation of the war strategy. After this, you will be made to experience the famous film show here and take a ride in the one-way battery car. After a full day of sightseeing here you will be made to head back for your hotel here where you will be staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 13 :</span>Xian – Shanghai</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be made to head to the airport where you will be boarding the flight heading for Shanghai. On reaching Shanghai our tour representative will receive you and firstly take you for a sightseeing tour here including places like – Jin Mao Tower, bund waterfront and indulge in an electro mobile ride which will take you through Huangpu river tunnel. After that, you will be made to stay at your hotel where you will be spending the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 14 :</span>Sightseeing Tour of Shanghai</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be taken on a full day on exploration here where you will be covering interesting places of tourist interests like – Buddha temple, Shanghai urban town planning museum, Yu Yuan Garden. By evening you will be taken on a spectacular and fun experience at the Shanghai Circus. After this, you will be made to head back to your hotel in Shanghai where you will be spending the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 15 :</span>Shanghai Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be assisted to your departure location here. our tour representative will drop you off at the location of your departure after breakfast and this will mark the end of your Japan China and Korea tour package with us and you will be free to head on for your desired destination.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Japan China Korea Tour Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Typical In Japan What About Korea And China?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> China, Japan, and Korea are major trade and investment partners for one another, and their economies are highly interdependent. Furthermore, they have a similar culture. Japan broke ranks and became the only non-Western, industrialized, and global military power by the early twentieth century.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The Distinction Between Japanese And Korean Cuisine?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Korean cuisine makes extensive use of spices and sauces, which play an important role in the flavour of each dish. Many Korean dishes season with Chili Pepper, but Japanese food rarely does. Japanese cuisine is generally less spicy than Korean cuisine.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Is Korea Regarded As A Cultural Link Between China And Japan?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Korea has also served as a "cultural bridge" between China and Japan throughout its history. Koreans adapted and transformed Chinese traditions from the beginning before passing them on to Japan. Despite its close relationship with China, the Korean language is unrelated to Chinese.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Religion Spread From Korea To China And Then To Japan?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Buddhism arose in India in the sixth century BCE and arrived in Japan in the sixth century C.E. after passing through China and Korea. Buddhism, as originally presented by the historical Buddha, was a path of practise that one could follow in order to find relief from suffering.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Are Some Chinese Food Facts?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Chinese cuisine is among the healthiest in the world. Traditional Chinese cuisine must always be prepared fresh. Most dishes are loaded with vegetables, grass-fed meats, seafood, and herbs and spices. Every ingredient has been carefully selected for medicinal purposes. Chinese people rarely consume canned or frozen foods.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>
